document_data.name: House of Spires
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Spires''' was a temple devoted to [[Loviatar]], the Maiden of Pain, during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The House of Spires rose to prominence rapidly during the mid–14{{th}} century DR, thanks mostly to the efforts of the temple's high priestess.
document_data.Inhabitants: Queen of Torment [[Chalathra Nyndra]] served as high priestess of the House of Spires during this time.
